resources.description: Due to the good ability of localization of time-frequency, which is suitable for frequency analysis in unstable time series, the wavelet analysis is widely used in scientific research in many fields. After the explanation of essential differences between wavelet analysis and Fourier transform, the paper summarizes the status-quo of Wavelet analysis’ applications in period analysis, filtering, trend analysis, singularity detection, and forecasting in hydrology. Problems and deficiencies of wavelet application in hydrology are figured out in the end.
resources.name: Application of Wavelet Analysis in Hydrology

name: application-of-wavelet-analysis-in-hydrology

Problems and deficiencies of wavelet application in hydrology are figured out in the end.  http://www.j-es.org/paperInfo.aspx?ID=894
title: Application of Wavelet Analysis in Hydrology
